entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
